alert.note: Alert for Luna (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued April 03 at 4:15PM MDT until April 03 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Central Luna County in southwestern New Mexico... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 414 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was over Deming. HAZARD...Less than three miles visibility with strong winds up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Satellite imagery and weather observations. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 75 and 94, in addition to Highway 11 south of Deming. Locations impacted include... Deming, Sunshine, Rock Hound State Park and Spring Canyon State Park. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
